original_text: It will be like this. When a woman is soon to give birth to a baby, she is sad. She knows that it will be painful. But after the baby is born, she is happy. She forgets her pain, because now she is so happy. She is happy because her child has been born into the world.
korean_text: 여자가 해산하게 되면 그 때가 이르렀으므로 근심하나 아기를 낳으면 세상에 사람 난 기쁨으로 말미암아 그 고통을 다시 기억하지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: When a woman is soon to give birth to a baby
sentences.korean_translation: 여자가 곧 아기를 낳게 될 때

sentences.original_text: She knows that it will be painful.
But after the baby is born
because now she is so happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 지금 그녀는 매우 행복하기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: because her child has been born into the world.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그녀의 자녀가 세상에 태어났기 때문이다.
